alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:50PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pueblo County through 515 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pueblo West, or near Pueblo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pueblo around 455 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
